mapper.select: select bh.id, bh.user_id, bh.room_id, bh.browse_time, ri.room_number, ri.rent, ai.name as apartmentName, ai.district_name, ai.city_name, ai.province_name from browsing_history bh left join room_info ri on bh.room_id = ri.id and ri.is_deleted = 0 left join apartment_info ai on ri.apartment_id = ai.id and ai.is_deleted = 0 and ai.is_release = 1 where bh.is_deleted = 0 and user_id = #{userId} order by browse_time desc
select name, url from graph_info where is_deleted = 0 and item_type = 2 and item_id = #{roomId}
